section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Roundtable for Europe's Energy Future is an innovative platform of leading energy companies (TSOs, DSOs and producers), which aims at contributing to the development of an interconnected European grid with empowered markets and consumers.
relevant_communication: The CEOs of the member companies meet twice a year with key policy-makers from the EU and Member States to present their Joint Messages. The latter are prepared ahead of the meetings by the companies’ EU representatives (the “Sherpa-group”) and are always related to better markets, stronger grids and smarter technologies.
